  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600

          text run at (0,0) width 354: "All of the table rows and cells below should be rotated."

        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (0,0) size 202x90
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,46) size 202x20
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,68) size 202x20
